text:
Just curious, is there a way to get a form without exposing the api key? `<https://api.hubapi.com/forms/v2/forms/>` requires an api key.

I am creating a custom form and need to build some of it from a the HubSpot form tool. This way my client can update the form without messing with the code.

I can successfully submit a `v3/form` without an api key, so I was curious if there is a way to get the name and values from a specific form id.
